alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 15 at 9:54AM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the southern Pamlico Sound, Bay and Lower Neuse Rivers, Core Sound, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From 1 PM Sunday to 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/06 AM 4.3 -1.5 1.3 1 None 15/07 PM 3.1 -2.7 1.1 1 None 16/07 AM 4.4 -1.4 1.3 1 None 16/07 PM 4.7 -1.1 2.6 2-4 None 17/07 AM 3.3 -2.5 0.3 1 None 17/07 PM 2.3 -3.5 0.3 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. A Coastal Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds and tides will combine to generate flooding of low areas along the shore.
